meanings.definition: In a way that is easily recognizable or understood
meanings.sent1: The instructions were patently simple to follow.
meanings.sent2: Her talent was patently obvious to everyone who saw her perform.
meanings.sent3: The cat patently understood that knocking over the vase would get attention.
meanings.sent4: The truth was patently hidden beneath layers of lies.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was patently breathtaking.
